title: Strategies for Enhancing Remote Education Satisfaction in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: College-level basic mathematics knowledge and experience using online learning tools
context.additional_context: Mathematics job training program conducted in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% educational satisfaction by designing personalized blended learning strategies.
Learners improve formative assessment performance (learning achievement) by 20% through the application of non-face-to-face interaction techniques.
Learners are evaluated on their ability to utilize mobile-optimized learning materials, with over 90% independently applying them.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
